text: Crossotus klugi is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by William Lucas Distant in 1892. It is known from Botswana, South Africa, Namibia, Mozambique, and Zimbabwe.BioLib.cz - Crossotus klugi. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1892
title: Crossotus klugi
